org.sat4j.minisat.core

クラス WatcherBasedPrimeImplicantStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sat4j.minisat.core.WatcherBasedPrimeImplicantStrategy
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    PrimeImplicantStrategy, MandatoryLiteralListener

    public class WatcherBasedPrimeImplicantStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements PrimeImplicantStrategy, MandatoryLiteralListener
    Watcher based implementation of the model minimization strategy to compute a prime implicant. The main advantage of this method is to be linear in the size (in number of literals) of the formula as long as a specific property holds for the constraints. That approach also takes advantage of the lazy data structures found in modern SAT solvers See our FMCAD 2013 paper for details.

      • compute

        public int[] compute(Solver<? extends DataStructureFactory> solver)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: PrimeImplicantStrategy
        returns a prime implicant from a solver object known to contain a model.
        定義:
        compute インタフェース内 PrimeImplicantStrategy
        戻り値:
        an sequence of Dimacs literals corresponding to the implicant.

      • getPrimeImplicantAsArrayWithHoles

        public int[] getPrimeImplicantAsArrayWithHoles()
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: PrimeImplicantStrategy
        returns the prime implicant as an array with hole. This is convenient to check if a particular variable belong to the prime implicant computed by PrimeImplicantStrategy.compute(Solver). Must be called after PrimeImplicantStrategy.compute(Solver).
        定義:
        getPrimeImplicantAsArrayWithHoles インタフェース内 PrimeImplicantStrategy
        戻り値:
